official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to require that at least 10 per centum of expenditures by the Postal Service under certain contracts entered into by the Postal Service are expended for minority business enterprises, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the United States Postal Service to expend at least ten percent of its total contractual expenditures for contracts with minority business enterprises. Provides for an exemption from such a requirement.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to require that at least 10 per centum of expenditures by the Postal Service under certain contracts entered into by the Postal Service are expended for minority business enterprises, and for other purposes.
